title: Enchanting Rose Gold Mangalsutra - A Symbol of Eternal Love
materials: 18K Rose Gold (750 hallmark) with Cubic Zirconia (CZ) accents. Features traditional black beads (Nalla Pusalu). Hyderabadi polish for a lasting sheen.
features: Contemporary mangalsutra design featuring delicate rose gold and CZ pendant drops evenly spaced along the black bead strand. The pendant design showcases modern symmetry. Hand-strung black beads for durability and traditional significance.
colors: and Sparkling White (CZ). The subtle contrast of the rose gold with the black beads creates a sophisticated look.
occasions: and other special occasions. Suitable for both modern and traditional attire.
description: A modern take on a timeless classic. Combines the sacred symbol of marriage (Maangalya Sutram) with contemporary design sensibilities. Durable 18K rose gold construction and brilliant Cubic Zirconia stones offer lasting beauty. Lightweight and comfortable for everyday wear. A perfect blend of tradition and modernity.
